title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.60 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.60 - Applicability

State Regulations

Surface water systems or systems using ground water under the direct influence of surface water that are community or nontransient noncommunity water systems, serve 15 or more service connections or serve 25 or more persons, and use conventional filtration treatment shall operate with enhanced coagulation to achieve the total organic carbon (TOC) percent removal levels specified in section
5-1.63
of this Subpart, unless the system meets the alternative compliance criteria described in section
5-1.62
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.60

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2018 /Volume XL, Issue 03, eff. 1/17/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
